content: Aaron Schulman, Associate Professor Aaron Schulman schulman@cs.ucsd.edu @skateprofessor Curriculum Vitae Who is Aaron Shalev? Associate Professor - UC San Diego Computer Science and Engineering Paul Jacobs Chancellor's Endowed Facultly Fellowship for Next Generation Wireless ChangeLog Jul 2, 2025 - Our work on scanning GEO satellite links that revealed a significant amount of internal sensitive unencrypted traffic will appear at ACM CCS 2025. Congrats to our students Wenyi, Annie, and Keegan! This work took 2.5 years, involved ~10 disclosures. The team was lead jointly with Nadia Heninger at UC San Diego and Dave Levin at University of Maryland.
